DOC.brief_title: Squire 's Quest ! II : Implementation Intentions Children 's Fruit , Juice , Vegetable ( FJV ) Consumption
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity increase among youth associate increase risk certain cancer chronic disease . Fruit , juice , vegetable ( FJV ) intake associate decreased risk many type cancer obesity , well recommended minimum five serving day . Innovative method need promote increase consumption among youth . Goal set enhances goal attainment , therefore , facilitate behavior change . Little research conduct , however , effective goal set method use youth . Among adult , formation implementation intention ( detailed plan , , goal achieve ) show enhance goal attainment and/or behavior change , include dietary change . Research need determine extend goal set process include implementation intention effective method enhance goal attainment , therefore , increase FJV intake among youth . Squire 's Quest ! proven-effective 10-session , 5 week interactive multi medium program enable child increase FJV consumption 1.0 serving day . Total consumption still well five serving day , however . Additionally , goal attainment relate FJV consumption among certain sub-groups youth . Therefore , additional work area warrant . The research outline proposal expand goal set component successful intervention include formation implementation intention . Hypotheses related impact implementation intention goal attainment FJV consumption test . Issues related maintenance youth dietary behavior change also explore . This project relevant public health enhance understand effectively help young child set achieve FJV goal result increase FJV consumption , decrease risk obesity certain cancer vulnerable segment population .
